mapper.insert: insert into ecs_package_goods (package_id, goods_id, admin_id, product_id, goods_number) values (#{packageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminId,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsNumber,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.select: select package_id, goods_id, admin_id, product_id, goods_number from ecs_package_goods
